description:
Langa makes it past the qualifiers and will now face JOE. Langa has a hard fight against JOE`s extraordinary power skating, and Langa feels the pressure. He feels bewildered by his emotional changes he feels there. And the race between ADAM and Cherry blossom takes place. Cherry blossom had a certain conviction against ADAM. ADAM`s expression changes. The past between the two of them is revealed.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Ano Toki, Oretachi wa Tokubetsu Datta
あの時, 俺たちは特別だった
